document.full_text: lawmakers considering new privacy laws scolded google and apple on tuesday for not doing enough to guard mobile device users' location data, despite executives' assertions that they do not abuse the information.
document.title: senators skeptical of google, apple mobile privacy
lines_and_colors: lawmakers considering new privacy laws scolded google and apple on tuesday for not doing enough to guard mobile device users' location data, despite executives' assertions that they do not abuse the information.
